(Statements
{+(Assignment
  {+(Identifier)+}
  {+(Integer)+})+}
  (Assignment
    (Statements
      (Identifier)
      (Identifier))
    (Statements
    {-(Integer)-}
      (Integer)
    {+(Integer)+}))
{+(Assignment
  {+(Identifier)+}
  {+(Statements
    {+(Integer)+}
    {+(Integer)+})+})+}
{-(Assignment
  {-(Identifier)-}
  {-(Integer)-})-}
{-(Assignment
  {-(Identifier)-}
  {-(Statements
    {-(Integer)-}
    {-(Integer)-})-})-})
